item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 31, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI O3-Mini (203 points | 223 comments)
2. FBI, Dutch police disrupt 'Manipulaters' phishing gang (33 points | discuss)
3. Show HN: Uscope, a new Linux debugger written from scratch (116 points | 46 comments)
4. Three AM 911 call, 9 AM salesman (118 points | 52 comments)
5. Zusie – My Relay Computer (66 points | 17 comments)
6. Theoretical limitations of multi-layer Transformer (37 points | 1 comment)
7. Fixing E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial for the Atari 2600 (2013) (60 points | 17 comments)
8. Shell-ish scripting in Go with ease (56 points | 7 comments)
9. Bypass DeepSeek censorship by speaking in hex (7 points | 2 comments)
10. Living with Nausea: My Story in Six Charts (60 points | 16 comments)
11. Apple files emergency motion to become defendant in US vs. Google [pdf] (271 points | 268 comments)
12. Better Know a Ruby Thing: Singleton Classes (30 points | 2 comments)
13. Distro (YC S24) Is Hiring a Chief of Staff in Palo Alto ( | hide)
14. Images reveal exocomets around nearby stars (64 points | 3 comments)
15. Meta in talks to reincorporate in Texas or another state, WSJ reports (29 points | 4 comments)
16. Real-time, river sections downstream of sewage discharges from storm overflows (33 points | 11 comments)
17. MillenniumDB: Property graph and RDF engine, still in development (52 points | 16 comments)
18. Large Language Models Think Too Fast to Explore Effectively (26 points | 4 comments)
19. Show HN: voidDB – A transactional key-value DB written in Go for 64-bit Linux (43 points | 13 comments)
20. Instagram and Facebook Blocked and Hid Abortion Pill Providers' Posts (18 points | 1 comment)
21. Hydro: Distributed Programming Framework for Rust (232 points | 42 comments)
22. Taking a $15 Casio F91W 5km underwater (282 points | 68 comments)
23. How to Train an AI Image Model on Yourself (106 points | 23 comments)
24. Show HN: Ldump – serialize any Lua data (83 points | 37 comments)
25. TCAS Avoided Collision with Army Helicopter over Potomac River [video] (27 points | 25 comments)
26. Ear muscle we thought humans didn't use activates when people listen hard (189 points | 161 comments)
27. Hacker News for Gamedev (409 points | 180 comments)
28. How do you comfort a JavaScript bug? (15 points | 3 comments)
29. TopoNets: High performing vision and language models with brain-like topography (210 points | 59 comments)
30. Traffic spikes are bad for your product (64 points | 68 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 31, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
